mapper.sql: meeting.id as meeting_id, meeting.work_order_num as meeting_work_order_num, meeting.start_time as meeting_start_time, meeting.end_time as meeting_end_time, meeting.meeting_room_id as meeting_meeting_room_id, meeting.approval_status as meeting_approval_status, meeting.record_status as meeting_record_status, meeting.creator_account as meeting_creator_account, meeting.created_time as meeting_created_time, meeting.modifier_account as meeting_modifier_account, meeting.modified_time as meeting_modified_time, meeting.user_id_str as meeting_user_id_str, meeting.applicant as meeting_applicant, meeting.application_time as meeting_application_time, meeting.sign_in_QR as meeting_sign_in_QR, meeting.wechat_remind as meeting_wechat_remind, meeting.message_remind as meeting_message_remind, meeting.pc_remind as meeting_pc_remind, meeting.app_remind as meeting_app_remind, meeting.is_remind as meeting_is_remind, meeting.title as meeting_title, meeting.approval_role as meeting_approval_role, meeting.approval_user as meeting_approval_user, meeting.approval_opinion as meeting_approval_opinion, meeting.meeting_status as meeting_meeting_status

meeting.id AS meeting_id, meeting.work_order_num AS meeting_work_order_num, date_format(meeting.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS meeting_start_date, date_format(meeting.start_time,'%k:%i') AS meeting_start_time, date_format(meeting.end_time,'%k:%i') AS meeting_end_time, meeting.meeting_room_id AS meeting_meeting_room_id, meeting.approval_status AS meeting_approval_status, meeting.record_status AS meeting_record_status, meeting.creator_account AS meeting_creator_account, meeting.created_time AS meeting_created_time, meeting.modifier_account AS meeting_modifier_account, meeting.modified_time AS meeting_modified_time, meeting.user_id_str AS meeting_user_id_str, meeting.applicant AS meeting_applicant, meeting.application_time AS meeting_application_time, meeting.sign_in_QR AS meeting_sign_in_QR, meeting.wechat_remind AS meeting_wechat_remind, meeting.message_remind AS meeting_message_remind, meeting.pc_remind AS meeting_pc_remind, meeting.app_remind AS meeting_app_remind, meeting.is_remind AS meeting_is_remind, meeting.title AS meeting_title, meeting.approval_role AS meeting_approval_role, meeting.approval_user AS meeting_approval_user, meeting.approval_opinion AS meeting_approval_opinion, meeting.meeting_status AS meeting_meeting_status, u.NAME AS userName, u.department_name AS departmentName, meetingroom.meetingroom_id, meetingroom.name as meetingRoomName, meetingroom.name as meetingroom_name, meetingroom.building as meetingroom_building, meetingroom.floor as meetingroom_floor, meetingroom.room_number as meetingroom_room_number, meetingroom.position as meetingroom_position, tc.content as content, (CASE meeting.meeting_status
WHEN 0 THEN '待开始' WHEN 1 THEN '进行中' WHEN 2 THEN '已完成' WHEN 3 THEN '已取消' END)meetingStatusMessage
mapper.update:
update tb_oa_meeting set record_status = 0, modifier_account=#{account}, modified_time = now() where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT meetingparticipants.id AS id, meetingparticipants.meeting_id AS meetingId, meetingparticipants.meeting_user_id AS meetingUserId, meetingparticipants.attendance_status AS attendanceStatus, u.name as userName, u.account FROM tb_oa_meeting_participants meetingparticipants
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.id, t.NAME, t.account
FROM tb_sys_user t where t.record_status=1 )u on u.id =meetingparticipants.meeting_user_id WHERE meetingparticipants.record_status != 0
and meetingparticipants.meeting_id=#{id}

select
FROM tb_oa_meeting meeting
where ( meeting.meeting_status =0 or meeting.meeting_status =1)
and meeting.meeting_room_id =#{meetingRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ( (meeting.start_time <#{startTime}and #{startTime}<meeting.end_time) or (meeting.start_time <#{endTime}and #{endTime}<meeting.end_time) OR ((meeting.start_time =#{startTime})OR( #{endTime}=meeting.end_time) ) )

SELECT t.id AS meeting_id, tt.phone AS applicantPhone, tt.wechat_account AS applicantWechatAccount, t.title AS meeting_title FROM ( SELECT round( ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( meeting.start_time ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( NOW( ) ) ) / 60 ) AS sub_time, meeting.start_time, meeting.applicant, meeting.id, meeting.title FROM tb_oa_meeting meeting WHERE meeting.is_remind is null ) t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.id, t.phone, t.wechat_account FROM tb_sys_user t WHERE t.record_status = 1 ) tt ON tt.id = t.applicant where t.sub_time>=0 and t.sub_time<=12
